snippet: At a party he hosted when he was prime minister, Silvio Berlusconi asked young women to simulate oral sex with a Greek statue, a witness at Mr. Berlusconi’s trial said Monday.
abstract: Chiara Danese, witness in the trial of former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, says that Berlusconi asked young women to simulate oral sex with a Greek statue at a party he hosted while prime minister; Berlusconi is accused of paying for sex with an underage prostitute.
lead_paragraph: At a party he hosted when he was prime minister, Silvio Berlusconi asked young women to simulate oral sex with a Greek statue, a witness at Mr. Berlusconi’s trial said Monday.

headline.main: Italy: Witness Describes Sex Games With Former Prime Minister
